mapper.select: select uli.userID as userID, u.showName as showName, u.avatar as avatar from user_login_info uli left join user_base u on uli.userID = u.userID where uli.loginPhoneNo=#{phoneNo} and uli.loginPasswords=#{password}

select uli.userID as userID, u.showName as showName, u.avatar as avatar from user_login_info uli left join user_base u on uli.userID = u.userID where uli.loginEmail=#{email} and uli.loginPasswords=#{password}
select userID from user_login_info where loginPhoneNo=#{phoneNo}
mapper.insert: insert into user_base (userID, showName, phoneNumber) values (#{userID}, #{showName}, #{phoneNo})
insert into user_login_info (userID, loginPhoneNo, loginPasswords) values (#{userID}, #{phoneNo}, #{password})
